products.name: Cheddar Cheese Block
products.description: Premium aged cheddar cheese with a sharp, rich flavor. Perfect for slicing, melting, or enjoying on its own.

products.name: Organic Whole Milk
products.description: Fresh, organic whole milk from grass-fed cows. Rich in calcium and essential nutrients for healthy bones.

products.name: Premium Greek Yogurt
products.description: Creamy, protein-rich Greek yogurt made from pure milk. Perfect for breakfast or as a healthy snack.

products.name: Free-Range Eggs Dozen
products.description: Fresh, high-quality eggs from free-range chickens. Rich in nutrients and great taste.

products.name: Organic Brown Eggs
products.description: Farm-fresh brown eggs from chickens raised with organic feed. Perfect source of protein.

products.name: Gourmet Cheese Selection
products.description: A curated collection of premium cheeses from around the world. Perfect for cheese lovers.

products.name: Mozzarella Cheese
products.description: Soft and creamy mozzarella cheese. Ideal for pizzas, salads, and Italian dishes.

products.name: Skimmed Milk
products.description: Low-fat skimmed milk with all the nutrients of whole milk. Great for a healthier lifestyle.

products.name: Quail Eggs
products.description: Delicate quail eggs with a rich flavor. Perfect for gourmet cooking and appetizers.

products.name: Blue Cheese
products.description: Strong and tangy blue cheese with distinctive blue veins. Perfect for salads and gourmet dishes.

products.name: Lactose-Free Milk
products.description: Creamy lactose-free milk that's easy to digest. Perfect for those with lactose sensitivity.

products.name: Almond Milk
products.description: Creamy plant-based almond milk. A nutritious dairy-free alternative rich in vitamins.
